title: he/she is provided with alternative accommodation of the size 405 sq ft carpet area in such development or redevelopment scheme
clause_text: he/she is provided with alternative accommodation of the size 405 sq ft carpet area in such development or redevelopment scheme. However, fungible compensatory area as permissible as per Regulation No 31(3) on the rehab component shall not be allowed for residential/ residential cum commercial. Fungible compensatory area as permissible as per Regulation No 31(3) shall be allowed only for non residential units or existing authorized area.
